objective: John Smith's account is locked and he can't log in

questions: Determine if any recent changes have been made to applications that rely on the authentication server (e.g., application updates, configuration changes).
Investigate if the application is correctly configured to communicate with the authentication server.
Check application logs for any errors related to authentication failures or connection problems.
Verify the application is using the correct authentication protocols and credentials.
problem_context.prior_findings: IT Support: Identified through structured investigation
